publicationStmt.p: published electronically as part of the TLS project at https://hxwd.org

sourceDesc.p: Created by members of the TLS project

tls:text.tls:line: as for mount Tài with respect to the mounds and hills,

sense.def: dialect: burial mound, often that of an emperor

tls:text.tls:line: "Tāng banished Jié

sense.def: Chéng Tāng, the founder of Shāng dynasty

tls:text.tls:line: and King Wǔ killed Zhòu,

sense.def: King Wu, founder of the Zhou Dynasty

tls:text.tls:line: "It exists in records."

sense.def: traditional account based on pre-existing sources, tradition

tls:text.tls:line: "He who outrages Goodness,

sense.def: damaged N; crippled N

tls:text.tls:line: He who outrages Rectitude,

sense.def: damaged N; crippled N

tls:text.tls:line: is called 'outcast'

sense.def: ordinary person

tls:text.tls:line: I have indeed hearth about punnishing outcast Zhòu,

sense.def: ordinary man Npr

tls:text.tls:line: I have indeed hearth about punnishing outcast Zhòu,

sense.def: the last, traditionally viewd as totally wicked, ruler of the Shāng dynasty

tls:text.tls:line: is it acceptable?"

sense.def: final question particle after verbal sentence 管仲儉乎？"Was Guǎnzhòng stingy?"

tls:text.tls:line: "As for my approach to the state,

sense.def: we (as used by the ruler to refer to himself)

tls:text.tls:line: "As for my approach to the state,

sense.def: NP-X is the subject of the deverbal Nab which is nominalised, resulting in topicalised NP 王之於國也

tls:text.tls:line: "As for my approach to the state,

sense.def: [our] state; [his] state, her state, their state, one's state; [the subject's] state

tls:text.tls:line: "As for my approach to the state,

sense.def: as for N, V

tls:text.tls:line: "As for my approach to the state,

sense.def: "as for the relation between"

tls:text.tls:line: I exhaust all my energy for it and nothing more.

sense.def: exhaust (resources N1) for the benefit of (something or somebody N2)

tls:text.tls:line: I exhaust all my energy for it and nothing more.

sense.def: the mind of the contextually determinate N

tls:text.tls:line: I exhaust all my energy for it and nothing more.

sense.def: have all my attention focussed on> make every effort on

tls:text.tls:line: I exhaust all my energy for it and nothing more.

sense.def: like 於之: in it, from it, to him etc.

tls:text.tls:line: I exhaust all my energy for it and nothing more.

sense.def: emphatic sentence final particle: and that's how it is, and there is nothing to add to this matter, and that's all to it

tls:text.tls:line: If there is disastrous famine in Hé Neì,

sense.def: there is/will be (supernaturally ordained) disaster

tls:text.tls:line: I move its people to Hé Dōng

sense.def: mover N1 to the place N2

tls:text.tls:line: I move its people to Hé Dōng

sense.def: "the relevant N, that relevant N, the N in question, the N involved"

tls:text.tls:line: I move its people to Hé Dōng

sense.def: the population of N

tls:text.tls:line: and move the grain to Hé Nèi.

sense.def: unhusked millet; generally: what is kept in the lín 廩 or cāng 倉 'granaries', grain, cereal

tls:text.tls:line: and move the grain to Hé Nèi.

sense.def: non-anaphoric but context-determined: amounts of the relevant

tls:text.tls:line: If there is disastrous famine in Hé Dōng,

sense.def: there is/will be (supernaturally ordained) disaster

tls:text.tls:line: I act correspondingly.

sense.def: likewise; also; as well (referring to predicate, often with repetition of the verb)

tls:text.tls:line: I act correspondingly.

sense.def: act thus, act in this way, behave in this way

tls:text.tls:line: When one investigates the administration of the neighbouring countries,

sense.def: look closely into, pay close attention to and investigate

tls:text.tls:line: When one investigates the administration of the neighbouring countries,

sense.def: neighbouring (person) 鄰童

tls:text.tls:line: When one investigates the administration of the neighbouring countries,

sense.def: enfeoffed state, state enfeoffed by the Zhou King

tls:text.tls:line: When one investigates the administration of the neighbouring countries,

sense.def: administration of the object N

tls:text.tls:line: When one investigates the administration of the neighbouring countries,

sense.def: administrative practice in the place N

tls:text.tls:line: there is no one there who is as energetic as I.

sense.def: there is a lack of

tls:text.tls:line: there is no one there who is as energetic as I.

sense.def: 聲亦如味 be like, look like, act like (what) 何如

tls:text.tls:line: there is no one there who is as energetic as I.

sense.def: effort

tls:text.tls:line: there is no one there who is as energetic as I.

sense.def: my

tls:text.tls:line: Yet the population of the neighbouring countries is not getting any smaller (for that)

sense.def: neighbouring (person) 鄰童

tls:text.tls:line: Yet the population of the neighbouring countries is not getting any smaller (for that)

sense.def: (not necessarily large, territorially conceived) state (within the empire)

tls:text.tls:line: Yet the population of the neighbouring countries is not getting any smaller (for that)

sense.def: enfeoffed state, state enfeoffed by the Zhou King

tls:text.tls:line: Yet the population of the neighbouring countries is not getting any smaller (for that)

sense.def: the population of N

tls:text.tls:line: Yet the population of the neighbouring countries is not getting any smaller (for that)

sense.def: sign of comparative: increasingly, to a higher degree

tls:text.tls:line: Yet the population of the neighbouring countries is not getting any smaller (for that)

sense.def: decrease

tls:text.tls:line: and my population is not increasing.

sense.def: my

tls:text.tls:line: and my population is not increasing.

sense.def: the population of N

tls:text.tls:line: and my population is not increasing.

sense.def: sign of comparative: increasingly, to a higher degree

tls:text.tls:line: and my population is not increasing.

sense.def: become more and more

tls:text.tls:line: Why is this so?

sense.def: absolute: Why is this? 何也?

tls:text.tls:line: Mencius replied politely:

sense.def: respond politely to what has been said; reply politely (typically to a superior)

tls:text.tls:line: Mencius replied politely:

sense.def: answer politely

tls:text.tls:line: "Your Majesty is fond of warfare,

sense.def: warfare

tls:text.tls:line: "Your Majesty is fond of warfare,

sense.def: be especially fond of; find especially attractive; show a special preference for

tls:text.tls:line: allow me, please, to explain it using a battle (as example):

sense.def: may I ask (for myself ) to V> please let me [short and idiomatic for 臣請]

tls:text.tls:line: allow me, please, to explain it using a battle (as example):

sense.def: warfare

tls:text.tls:line: allow me, please, to explain it using a battle (as example):

sense.def: make one's point about the contextually determinate thing

tls:text.tls:line: allow me, please, to explain it using a battle (as example):

sense.def: e.g. 以近知遠 "basing oneself on the near understand the distant": making intellectual use of; basing oneself on

tls:text.tls:line: Bang bang, set the drums the armies into movement,

sense.def: beat the drums to attack (the enemy); attack

tls:text.tls:line: the armies already came into contact.

sense.def: armed force, army in general

tls:text.tls:line: the armies already came into contact.

sense.def: already

tls:text.tls:line: the armies already came into contact.

sense.def: interact with the contextually determinate other party

tls:text.tls:line: the armies already came into contact.

sense.def: to meet, to interact with one another

tls:text.tls:line: (The soldiers) fled throwing away armours and trailing the weapons.

sense.def: abandon; set aside; discard (as no longe of use), throw away (useless things); refuse to accept

tls:text.tls:line: (The soldiers) fled throwing away armours and trailing the weapons.

sense.def: armour made of leather [often lacquered Jakob Marsalek]

tls:text.tls:line: (The soldiers) fled throwing away armours and trailing the weapons.

sense.def: to trail, to drag passively something behind himself

tls:text.tls:line: (The soldiers) fled throwing away armours and trailing the weapons.

sense.def: weapon; weapons

tls:text.tls:line: (The soldiers) fled throwing away armours and trailing the weapons.

sense.def: run away, flee; leave quickly[CHECK YOUR LEX ATTRIB][CA]

tls:text.tls:line: Some of them stopped after one hundred paces,

sense.def: some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others

tls:text.tls:line: Some of them stopped after one hundred paces,

sense.def: ancient Chinese pace equivalent to two paces in our calculations, step; particularly: dignified steps or regular steps

tls:text.tls:line: Some of them stopped after one hundred paces,

sense.def: a hundred times

tls:text.tls:line: Some of them stopped after one hundred paces,

sense.def: V2 only after having V1ed, to V1 and only after that V2

tls:text.tls:line: Some of them stopped after one hundred paces,

sense.def: stop walking or running

tls:text.tls:line: Some of them stopped after one hundred paces,

sense.def: make a step

tls:text.tls:line: some of them stopped after fifty paces.

sense.def: make a step

tls:text.tls:line: some of them stopped after fifty paces.

sense.def: V2 only after having V1ed, to V1 and only after that V2

tls:text.tls:line: some of them stopped after fifty paces.

sense.def: stop, fail to go on doing what one was doing; desist MOVE THESE TO THE NEXT LEXEME ENTRY

tls:text.tls:line: If one hundred paces were mocked from the point of view of fifty paces,

sense.def: make a step

tls:text.tls:line: If one hundred paces were mocked from the point of view of fifty paces,

sense.def: normally: find ridiculous and laugh at, sneer at

tls:text.tls:line: If one hundred paces were mocked from the point of view of fifty paces,

sense.def: laugh at the (nominalised) situation S

tls:text.tls:line: If one hundred paces were mocked from the point of view of fifty paces,

sense.def: those who step so-and-so-many times

tls:text.tls:line: If one hundred paces were mocked from the point of view of fifty paces,

sense.def: taking so-and-so-many steps

tls:text.tls:line: what would it be like?
what would it be like?

sense.def: How about S?

tls:text.tls:line: what would it be like?

sense.def: What would S resemble> how about the situation if S?

tls:text.tls:line: That would unacceptable.

sense.def: be unacceptable

tls:text.tls:line: They just did not run hundred paces and that is all.

sense.def: only; the only thing to do was

tls:text.tls:line: They just did not run hundred paces and that is all.

sense.def: make a step

tls:text.tls:line: They just did not run hundred paces and that is all.

sense.def: emphatic sentence final particle: and that's how it is, and there is nothing to add to this matter, and that's all to it

tls:text.tls:line: Such behaviour is also a case of running away.

sense.def: this (kind of) Nab

tls:text.tls:line: Such behaviour is also a case of running away.

sense.def: likewise, also (sometimes with omitted antecedent, as in 盜亦有道乎？)

tls:text.tls:line: Such behaviour is also a case of running away.

sense.def: be an act of fleeing

tls:text.tls:line: Such behaviour is also a case of running away.

sense.def: is to be classified as N

tls:text.tls:line: If you understand this properly,

sense.def: your majesty

tls:text.tls:line: If you understand this properly,

sense.def: if N V-s then S

seg.line: 則無望民之多於鄰國也。

tls:text.tls:srcline: 則無望民之多於鄰國也。
tls:text.tls:line: so do not in any case expect that the population will be bigger than in the neighbouring states.

sense.def: (GENERALLY probitive) should not in general; should never; should never again

tls:text.tls:srcline: 則無望民之多於鄰國也。
tls:text.tls:line: so do not in any case expect that the population will be bigger than in the neighbouring states.

sense.def: to hope that (something will take place), nourish vain hopes that S

tls:text.tls:srcline: 則無望民之多於鄰國也。
tls:text.tls:line: so do not in any case expect that the population will be bigger than in the neighbouring states.

sense.def: the common people of the contextually determinate place, the native people, the permanently resident people

tls:text.tls:srcline: 則無望民之多於鄰國也。
tls:text.tls:line: so do not in any case expect that the population will be bigger than in the neighbouring states.

sense.def: one's people; the people of the contextually determinate ruler of them N

tls:text.tls:srcline: 則無望民之多於鄰國也。
tls:text.tls:line: so do not in any case expect that the population will be bigger than in the neighbouring states.

sense.def: NP-X is the subject of the deverbal Nab which is nominalised, resulting in topicalised NP 王之於國也

tls:text.tls:srcline: 則無望民之多於鄰國也。
tls:text.tls:line: so do not in any case expect that the population will be bigger than in the neighbouring states.

sense.def: be more than 多於鄰國

tls:text.tls:srcline: 則無望民之多於鄰國也。
tls:text.tls:line: so do not in any case expect that the population will be bigger than in the neighbouring states.

sense.def: neighbouring (person) 鄰童

tls:text.tls:srcline: 則無望民之多於鄰國也。
tls:text.tls:line: so do not in any case expect that the population will be bigger than in the neighbouring states.

sense.def: the contextually determiate N (e.g. population) of the state

tls:text.tls:line: But as far as the accomplishment of the intended result is concerned,

sense.def: 若夫Ｘ: as far as X is concerned

tls:text.tls:line: As for embellishments,

sense.def: 若夫Ｘ: as far as X is concerned

tls:text.tls:line: On the other hand, the gentleman is free from vexations.

sense.def: 若夫Ｘ: as far as X is concerned

tls:text.tls:line: Outstanding men

sense.def: 若夫Ｘ: as far as X is concerned

tls:text.tls:line: This refers to what I have said.

sense.def: This (preceding text) is applicable to the present case/example

tls:text.tls:line: This refers to what I have said.

sense.def: as in 此之謂 "(The above phrase) may be properly applied to this." NOT refer to but only: apply to, be applicable to

tls:text.tls:line: This refers to what I have said."

sense.def: This (preceding text) is applicable to the present case/example

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore, the reason why you do not rule like a true King

sense.def: 老之將至 nominaliser converting a subject-VP predicate sentence into an abstract nominalisation

tls:text.tls:line: I had a wary mind.

sense.def: warn and instruct, admonish

tls:text.tls:line: Mencius had an audience with the King Huì of Liáng (i.e. Wèi).

sense.def: Liáng 梁 (CHEN PAN 1969, 450-453)

tls:text.tls:line: Mencius had an audience with the King Huì of Liáng (i.e. Wèi).

sense.def: Standard Name: Mèng Kē 孟軻 (372-289)Personal Name: Zǐ Yú 子輿 Unger no. 492; Mèng Kē, i.e. Mencius

tls:text.tls:line: Mencius had an audience with the King Huì of Liáng (i.e. Wèi).

sense.def: King X, 平王
plural: canon of laws; laws

tls:text.tls:line: As for the valour which was cultivated by Mèng Shīshè:

sense.def: the npro object which the understood or explicit subject has Vt-ed: 所亡地

tls:text.tls:line: His wife asked about his companions,

sense.def: those Vt-ing which/whom the explicit or implicit subject V-ed or V-s

tls:text.tls:line: His wife asked about his companions,

sense.def: take a meal; eat and drink

tls:text.tls:line: His wife asked about his companions,

sense.def: the/a person(s) who V(MUST BE MOVED INTO PRONOUN)

tls:text.tls:line: and they all turned out to be men of wealth and consequence.

sense.def: the whole lot of the subjects; all subjects indiscriminately, all subjects without exceptions; without exception

tls:text.tls:line: and they all turned out to be men of wealth and consequence.

sense.def: be rich and noble

tls:text.tls:line: His wife said to the concubine,

sense.def: main wife of N

tls:text.tls:line: His wife said to the concubine,

sense.def: concubine

tls:text.tls:line: This being the case, though you may not have killed your father and brother with your own hands,

sense.def: kill with one's own hands

tls:text.tls:line: The King said:

sense.def: king of the contextually determinate place N

tls:text.tls:line: not considering one thousand lǐ to be too far you have come here,

sense.def: and in that way, and thus, and as a result, and consequently

tls:text.tls:line: surely you must have something wherewith to bring profit to my state!"

sense.def: have

tls:text.tls:line: surely you must have something wherewith to bring profit to my state!"

sense.def: N=ruler: N's state, the state governed by N

tls:text.tls:line: Mencius replied politely:

sense.def: answer politely

tls:text.tls:line: " Why must Your Majesty speak of 'profit'?

sense.def: Your Majesty! (new subject....)

tls:text.tls:line: What I surely have [for you] is Goodness and Rectitude, and that is all.

sense.def: currently relevant verbal statement; new situationtensed

tls:text.tls:line: If Your Majesty says:

sense.def: your majesty

tls:text.tls:line: 'How can one bring profit to my state?'

sense.def: how? by what means? (non-rhet.)

tls:text.tls:line: then the dignitaries will say,

sense.def: notables; dignitaries

tls:text.tls:line: 'How can one bring profit to our clan?'

sense.def: family of N

tls:text.tls:line: and gentlemen as well as commoners will say,

sense.def: educated person (of high or low morals); member of the mobile intelligentia; mobile gentleman with a right to bear a sword and to ride in a carriage

tls:text.tls:line: and gentlemen as well as commoners will say,

sense.def: SHU: the numerous humans, the common people;

tls:text.tls:line: and the state will get into danger.

sense.def: and in that way, and thus, and as a result, and consequently

tls:text.tls:line: and the state will get into danger.

sense.def: [our] state; [his] state, her state, their state, one's state; [the subject's] state

tls:text.tls:line: In a state with ten thousand war chariots,

sense.def: ten thousand; 10 000

tls:text.tls:line: In a state with ten thousand war chariots,

sense.def: war chariot; carriage with four horses; 魯國堯:一车四马为一乘。当时战争的形式主要是车战，一辆兵车由四匹马拉，车上有三名武装战士，后有若干步兵。古代常以兵车的多少衡量诸侯国或卿大夫封邑的大小。

tls:text.tls:line: In a state with ten thousand war chariots,

sense.def: possessed of 10 000 chariots> powerful, militarily mighty

tls:text.tls:line: anyone assassinating its ruler (with any lasting success for himself),

sense.def: N lives in the place npro 移其民"move the people of the place"

tls:text.tls:line: anyone assassinating its ruler (with any lasting success for himself),

sense.def: N's ruler

tls:text.tls:line: anyone assassinating its ruler (with any lasting success for himself),

sense.def: generalising, hypothetical, untensed: anyone who V-s

tls:text.tls:line: would certainly be of a clan with thousand chariots.

sense.def: be certain (to be N)

tls:text.tls:line: would certainly be of a clan with thousand chariots.

sense.def: possessing one thousand of chariots > mighty

tls:text.tls:line: One thousand out of ten

sense.def: ten thousand of items

tls:text.tls:line: One thousand out of ten

sense.def: one thousand of items

tls:text.tls:line: One thousand out of ten

sense.def: from it; from this

tls:text.tls:line: or one hundred out of a thousand

sense.def: one hundred of items

tls:text.tls:line: If someone really places rectitude last and profit first,

sense.def: if really

tls:text.tls:line: If someone really places rectitude last and profit first,

sense.def: read qùshēng: treat (in practice) as being of secondary importance; humiliate through lack of respect

tls:text.tls:line: If someone really places rectitude last and profit first,

sense.def: and at the same time, and on that occasion

tls:text.tls:line: If someone really places rectitude last and profit first,

sense.def: regard as the more/most important

tls:text.tls:line: If someone really places rectitude last and profit first,

sense.def: one's own considerations of egoistic profit in opposition to 仁義; considerations of pofit

tls:text.tls:line: If someone really places rectitude last and profit first,

sense.def: notion of what is right

tls:text.tls:line: There never has been anyone who, being Good, abandoned his parents;

sense.def: there has never been a case of N

tls:text.tls:line: There never has been anyone who, being Good, abandoned his parents;

sense.def: be kind-hearted in disposition, be humane in disposition, be of kindly disposition

tls:text.tls:line: There never has been anyone who, being Good, abandoned his parents;

sense.def: and 任重而道遠"his burden is heavy and the way is far"

tls:text.tls:line: There never has been anyone who, being Good, abandoned his parents;

sense.def: N's parents

tls:text.tls:line: There never has been anyone who, being Good, abandoned his parents;

sense.def: generalising, hypothetical, untensed: anyone who V-s

tls:text.tls:line: There never has been anyone who, being Good, abandoned his parents;

sense.def: N has the kinship relation to PRO

tls:text.tls:line: There never has been anyone who, being possesed of rectitude, put his sovereign last.

sense.def: be righteous in disposition

tls:text.tls:line: There never has been anyone who, being possesed of rectitude, put his sovereign last.

sense.def: N has the social relation N to npro

tls:text.tls:line: There never has been anyone who, being possesed of rectitude, put his sovereign last.

sense.def: N's ruler

tls:text.tls:line: Your Majesty should surely speak of Goodness and rectitude

sense.def: surely！ surely, like everyone else

tls:text.tls:line: Your Majesty should surely speak of Goodness and rectitude

sense.def: morality as such; the concept of moral principles

tls:text.tls:line: Your Majesty should surely speak of Goodness and rectitude

sense.def: ..., and that is all. [Note the immensely complex problems of scope of this phrase.]

tls:text.tls:line: Why must you speak of profit.

sense.def: one's own considerations of egoistic profit in opposition to 仁義; considerations of pofit

tls:text.tls:line: ' He planned and began the Terrace of Supernatural Efficacy

sense.def: take as one's starting point; to begin to work with, to start working at something (in Shijing 經始靈臺)

tls:text.tls:line: ' He planned and began the Terrace of Supernatural Efficacy

sense.def: the Npr Terrace

tls:text.tls:line: The King was standing by a pond,

sense.def: 立於門外

tls:text.tls:line: The King was standing by a pond,

sense.def: in; at; to; from; by

tls:text.tls:line: "Presumably a worthy, too, enjoys these?"

sense.def: these things

tls:text.tls:line: "Presumably a worthy, too, enjoys these?"

sense.def: final question particle after verbal sentence 管仲儉乎？"Was Guǎnzhòng stingy?"

tls:text.tls:line: "Presumably a worthy, too, enjoys these?"

sense.def: read yào: like to engage in; take one's pleasure in, take one's pleasure with

tls:text.tls:line: Mencius answered politely:

sense.def: answer politely

tls:text.tls:line: "Indeed one has to be a worthy to (really) enjoy these things.

sense.def: consider as delightful, experience as delightful> take delight in

tls:text.tls:line: Those who are not worthy, even if they do have these, they will not enjoy them.

sense.def: not negating an adnominal verb or "adjective"

tls:text.tls:line: Those who are not worthy, even if they do have these, they will not enjoy them.

sense.def: of persons: be (the more) worthy; be distinguished; be morally distinguished, be a worthy, be talented; be excellent (sometimes also of actions) 甚賢，最賢

tls:text.tls:line: in few days they completed it.

sense.def: finish the building process of, get built

tls:text.tls:line: but the ordinary people came like children (to help their father).

sense.def: come to the place N where the speaker is

tls:text.tls:line: The King was in the Park of Supernatural Efficacy.

sense.def: ZUO: park used by the aristocracy for hunting and pleasure; MENG mentions a park forty square lǐ in size

tls:text.tls:line: where the doe lay

sense.def: hatch

tls:text.tls:line: King Wén used the labour of the people and built the terrace and the pond,

sense.def: King Wén, father of the founder of Zhōu dynasty

tls:text.tls:line: King Wén used the labour of the people and built the terrace and the pond,

sense.def: regarding the people, concerning the people; by the people

tls:text.tls:line: and the people were perfectly happy with this.

sense.def: one's people; the people of the contextually determinate ruler of them N

tls:text.tls:line: and they were delighted that he possessed his milu deer, his fish and his turtles.

sense.def: be happy about the fact S

tls:text.tls:line: and they were delighted that he possessed his milu deer, his fish and his turtles.

sense.def: have; own by right; have in one's possession or control

tls:text.tls:line: The men of antiquity shared their joys with the people,

sense.def: leading: the (leading) people belonging to the time N

tls:text.tls:line: Tāng's Oath says:

sense.def: Chéng Tāng, the founder of Shāng dynasty

tls:text.tls:line: (The people say:) 'This Sun (i.e. Jie), when will it perish?

sense.def: sun

tls:text.tls:line: (The people say:) 'This Sun (i.e. Jie), when will it perish?

sense.def: pre-classical interrogative adverbial "when?"???, loan for 曷hé

tls:text.tls:line: We and you will die together.'

sense.def: together; together with someone, in company 與子偕老

tls:text.tls:line: We and you will die together.'

sense.def: die

tls:text.tls:line: but could he have enjoyed them all by himself?"

sense.def: enjoy the contextually determinate thing

tls:text.tls:line: Supposing amoung your subjects there was such one, who entrusted his wife and children to his friend

sense.def: your majesty's

tls:text.tls:line: (his friend) had allowed his wife and children to freeze and to starve.

sense.def: but, as unexpected, nonetheless

tls:text.tls:line: What should he do with him?

sense.def: then (after S)

tls:text.tls:line: yet if they are not ripe

sense.def: if really

tls:text.tls:line: If a thing has no source,

sense.def: if really, if in fact

tls:text.tls:line: If one has not the foresight to ut such a thing by,

sense.def: if really, if in fact

tls:text.tls:line: If it is proper to take office then to take office,

sense.def: It is acceptable (for anyone) to V; It is appropriate (for anyone) to V

tls:text.tls:line: if it is proper to retreat from office then to retreat from office,

sense.def: It is acceptable (for anyone) to V; It is appropriate (for anyone) to V

tls:text.tls:line: if it is proper to delay one's departure them to delay the departure

sense.def: It is acceptable (for anyone) to V; It is appropriate (for anyone) to V

tls:text.tls:line: 'The one who created these verses,

sense.def: produce> e.g. 為此詩者 "he who has written/composed this song" write; compose

tls:text.tls:line: 'The one who created these verses,

sense.def: the/a person(s) who V-ed (MUST BE MOVED INTO PRONOUN)

tls:text.tls:line: then among unrestrainedness, depravity, wickedness, extravagance,

sense.def: depraved, deviant action

tls:text.tls:line: and the writings of the ancients, [reads out]

sense.def: as in Mencius: 讀其書不知其人可乎？“reading (out) someone's writings and not knowing anything about him (i.e. the writer), is that acceptable?" the N authored by npro

tls:text.tls:line: When one reads the poems [chants]

sense.def: as in Mencius: 讀其書不知其人可乎？“reading (out) someone's writings and not knowing anything about him (i.e. the writer), is that acceptable?" the N authored by npro

tls:text.tls:line: When one reads the poems [chants]

sense.def: as in Mencius: 讀其書不知其人可乎？“reading (out) someone's writings and not knowing anything about him (i.e. the writer), is that acceptable?" the N authored by npro
